trans-unit.source: Provides the remote procedure call (RPC) interface for all formatters.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller remote procedure call (RPC) gränssnitt för alla-formaterare.

trans-unit.source: The IRemotingFormatter interface allows the implementing formatter to send and receive remote procedure calls (RPCs).
trans-unit.target: Gränssnittet IRemotingFormatter kan implementera Formateraren skickar och tar emot remote procedure call (RPC-anrop).
Det här gränssnittet är härledd från <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.IFormatter>

trans-unit.source: Begins the deserialization process of a remote procedure call (RPC).
trans-unit.target: Börjar deserialisering av remote procedure call (RPC).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header> objects contain information about a remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header>objekt som innehåller information om en fjärransluten funktionsanrop (till exempel transaktions-ID eller en signatur).</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > See the SOAP specification for more information on headers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SOAP-specifikationen för mer information om huvuden finns.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> from which the data is deserialized.
The delegate designed to handle <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Delegaten utformats för att hantera <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: The root of the deserialized object graph.
Starts the serialization process of a remote procedure call (RPC).
trans-unit.target: Startar processen serialisering av remote procedure call (RPC).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header> objects contain information about a remote function call (for example, transaction ID or a method signature).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header>objekt som innehåller information om en fjärransluten funktionsanrop (till exempel transaktions-ID eller en signatur).</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > See the SOAP specification for more information on headers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > SOAP-specifikationen för mer information om huvuden finns.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> onto which the specified graph is serialized.
The root of the object graph to be serialized.
The array of <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header"></xref> objects to transmit with the graph specified by the `graph` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Matris med <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.Header"> </xref> objekt att överföra med graph som anges av den `graph` parameter.
